Traceable identifier for the plant or ge: Serial number or other unique identifier, name plate, manufacturer and or model
Grid reference: Give the reference for the stack or emission point. gridreferencefinder.com can help you find this
Date operation started - month and year: No need to give the day
Fuel type: Gas oil, natural gas, biogas or other gaseous fuel
Operating hours per year: This is the time when the combustion plant is operating and discharging emissions into the air. You can exclude start-up and shut-down time.
Air Quality Management Area name: If not in an AQMA write 'None'
Distance in metres to closest sensitive: For example hospitals, schools, care facilities etc
Distance in metres to closest natural re: Protected nature site - for example RAMSAR, SSI etc
Background nitrogen oxides (NOX) in ug/m: Contact local authority for latest data

Row number: You can only enter 15 generators on this template. If you have more contact us by email at MCPDHelp@environment-agency.gov.uk.
